content: कलन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Causing, effecting. --नः A sort of cane. --नं {@--1@} A spot, mark. {@--2@} A defect, an offence, fault. {@--3@} Taking, seizing, grasping; कलनात्सर्वभूतानां स कालः परिकीर्तितः. {@--4@} Knowing, understanding, apprehension. {@--5@} Sounding. {@--6@} An embryo at the first stage after conception. --ना {@--1@} Taking, seizing. grasping; कालकलना <ls>Ā. L. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Doing, effecting. {@--3@} Subjection. {@--4@} Understanding, comprehension. {@--5@} Putting on, wearing.
